org.openlca.io

Class Categories

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlca.io.Categories

  • public final class Categories
extends Object
    A helper class for the import, export, and display of categories.

                                                       org.openlca.core.model.ModelType type,

        Returns a root category with the given name and type from the database or null if no such category exists. The case of the names are ignored.
